column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Holy cr@p this place is delicious. If you come at an obviously busy time
column3: yes you'll have to wait. But if you come during less-than-peak hours you'll have food on your plate within minutes of ordering. I love that the service is quick and polite without being pushy or over-attentive. The portions are HUGE but the quality isn't compromised. I was impressed that they cater well for allergies (gluten and dairy for me). I'll be back again and again.
